Summary: To evaluate how the market's pricing of a sector has changed over time
Vars: Number of firms in the indusry grouping.

Aggregated market capitalization of listed companies today as of specific date. (Since new companies can be listed or companies can delist, be acquired or otherwise go away, the aggregate market cap of sectors can be different if you counted all companies that existed on that date.)
Market's pricing of companies, based upon market conditions and expectations at the time.
Computes the percentage change in market capitalization
This reflects the market's reassessment of the collective value of an entire sector. (This may be different from returns on the sector.
table_summary: This table provides a comprehensive overview of the financial performance of various industries. It includes the number of firms in each industry, quarterly financial data for two different periods, and annual financial data from 2018 to 2023. The table also includes columns that represent the percentage changes in financial performance for each year. This data can be used to analyze trends and performance metrics across different industries over time.
